scripts.build: pnpm run figma:export-components && pnpm run build:icons && pnpm run build:meta
scripts.figma:export-components: FIGMA_TOKEN=$(grep FIGMA_TOKEN .env | cut -d '=' -f2) figma-export components $(grep FIGMA_FILE .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -O @figma-export/output-components-as-svg --output ./src
